name: Shimeji Dance

name: Prank Rabbit

name: YamadaLui54Sen

name: Workout
ability: This card can only be used if you have a collab holomem, or your opponent has no collab holomem. During this turn, 1 of your holomem gets Arts+20. If that holomem is a Buzz holomem or 2nd holomem, that holomem gets Arts+50 instead.

Then, if there are 0 cards in your cheer deck, during this turn, when your holomem with #ID Gen 1 downs your opponent's center holomem, your opponent gets life-1.

name: Ebifrion
ability: The holomem this mascot is attached to gets +20 HP. ‚óÜAdditional ability if attached to <Natsuiro Matsuri> During your opponent's turn, if the holomem this mascot is attached to is downed, you may reattach 1 yellow cheer from this holomem to your other <Natsuiro Matsuri>. name: Matsurisu
ability: If your [Oshi holomem or holomem with #Gen 1] rolled a die by an ability, you may archive this fan:Regard the result of one dice roll as 4. You may only attach this fan to your <Natsuiro Matsuri>, and you may attach any number of this fan per holomem.

name: Subatomo
ability: During your opponent's turn, if the holomem this fan is attached to is downed, send the top card of your cheer deck to your <Oozora Subaru>. You may only attach this fan to your <Oozora Subaru>, and you may attach any number of this fan per holomem.
